title.rendered: MLB Player Prop Parlay for Friday, July 21st

content.rendered:
It’s Friday, which means that Winners and Whiners Expert Handicapper Mason Folz, has been in the books to find you his favorite MLB Player Props! Let’s see what Money Ma$e has cooked up for today for the odds courtesy of Draft Kings!

When making a player prop parlay, I like to lean on the conservative side. I don’t take many risky picks, just because I want my bet to have the best possibility of winning. I also like to focus on the hottest teams and the hottest players, as they are more than likely going to be your best bet. When a professional baseball player goes on a streak, it is hard for anyone to stop them. So, notice that trend today and get ready to get back into the green! How to Make Player Props Work for You!

Bet $5 Get $200 Instantly + Up to $150 in No Sweat Bets

Grab the Offer Now!
Disclaimer
Gambling problem? Call (877-8-HOPENY) or text HOPENY (467369). If you or someone you know has a gambling problem, crisis counseling and referral services can be accessed by calling 1-800-GAMBLER (1-800-426-2537) (IL/IN/LA/MI/MD/NJ/OH/PA/TN/WV/WY), 1-800-NEXT STEP (AZ), 1-800-522-4700 (CO/KS), 888-789-777/visit ccpg.org (CT), 1-800-BETS OFF (IA), or 1-88-532-3500 (VA).

Braxton Garrett Over 5.5 Strikeouts (-130)

I will be taking Garrett to get over 5.5 strikeouts, as he has played very well as of late and the Rockies have continued to slide in the wrong direction. He has also recorded 106 strikeouts this season and the Rockies strike out the ninth most. They will have a few dreadful innings and Garrett will be able to pitch deep into this game. Pick Braxton Garrett Over 5.5 Strikeouts and trust him at home.

 

Ranger Suarez Over 3.5 Strikeouts (-120)

Philadelphia has been one of the hottest teams in the MLB as of late and so has Ranger Suarez. The LHP has recorded 62 strikeouts this season and the Guardians have struggled at the plate at different times this season. Suarez has also recorded at least 4 strikeouts in 4 of his last 5 starts. He will stay solid in this one and push this total over the number.

Andrew Heaney Under 6.5 Strikeouts (-160)

This number is simply too high, as Heaney has been cold as of late. He has lost three of his last four starts and the Dodgers have shown that they can show up at the dish. He won’t pitch deep enough into this game to push his strikeouts total over the number. L.A. is (8-2) in their last 10 and Heaney hasn’t recorded more than four strikeouts in his last two games. He’s cold right now and his total will remain under the number.

 

Total Parlay Odds: +427 on Draft Kings

When betting on MLB player props, finding the hottest and coldest players is key. Finding these trends allows you to have a leg up on your competition. Because when someone is HOT, they’re more than likely going to stay on FIRE! These pitchers have all had consistent trends as of late and I don’t expect them to slow down today!
